sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPRIT, a small boom or pole which crosses the sail of a boat diagonally, from the mast to the upper hindmost corner of the sail, which it is used to extend and elevate ; the lower end of the sprit rests in a sort of wreath or collar, called the smotter, which encircles the mast in that place.
